crimeaditionalinfo:
The below message received from mobile no  Dear customer Your SBI Bank documents has been expired Your account will be blocked in hrs Please update your KYC in click here link httpsibitlyYSb  to my registered SBI mobile no   Hence I click on the above  link and try to complete KYC information  After completed  Percent of KYC Updation I got a message  Dear customer Your ac no  is debited for Rs on  and ac credited  IMPS Ref no  If not done  by you call SBI 
  Dear customer OTP to approve transaction of Rs from Your Ac Noending  to INFINIT RETAIL LIMITED IS  Do not share with anyone  SBI
 Dear Customer OTP to approve transaction of Rs from your AC Noending  to INFINIT RETAIL LIMITED is  Do not share with anyone SBI
 Dear Customer  OTP to approve transaction of Rs from your AC Noending   to CUBBER TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LI is  Do not Share with anyone  Sbi
I entered all the OTP to the fake SBI URL  and I got a message the above said  amount has been deducted to my SBI Saving account 
Finally I understood this is a fake SBI URL and Unauthorised Person theft my amount Rs  to my SBI Saving account Using Fake SBI URL with OTP I alreaday gave complliant to Local PS  Sankar Nagar at th Jan  and having CSR Copy Also gave complaint to Palavanthangal Cyber Crime on the same day

I want to report a financial fraud in the name of a personal loan by an app called Onstream This app offers personal loan without any disclosure of the sanctioned loan amount and without any breakup of interest and charges I applied for a short term loan on this app on  Feb  for an amount of Rs  for  days which is to be paid with interest as Rs  But the loan received in my account was Rs  However while processing the loan it was never mentioned that Rs  will be given As per this calculation this app is asking for Rs  as interest for  days on the principal amount of Rs  This app is also not registered as an NBFC with RBI as required to give loans to the general public On the other hand when i inquired about the breakup of difference between the loan amount ie Rs  and sanctioned amount ie Rs  these people started to assault me I asked them to call me through a normal phone callso that i can record the conversation but they denied by saying that they can only call through whatsapp as per their company policy They are threatening me to call my contacts through my call log which is again prohibited as per Govt norms I request you to take quick action against these people as they must be conning others as well and cheating laymen like me in the name of personal loan

I request you to take immediate action against these frauds

I am sharing the whatsapp number from which i am receiving the threats and communication

In continuation to last cyber crime ID  regarding hacked network I changed my number last week Jan   from  to 
On  Jan  afternoon I was about to login to my office ID I was not getting text or incoming calls outgoing calls So I had gone to Airtel gallery to check if there is any network issue There wasnt my sim was corrupted by hacker While going to Airtel gallery Ive not taken my new number with me So he called me on  from these numbers  attached screenshots and he had registered my WhatsApp account with his device Ive received a confirmation message about this 
I received a message on WhatsApp from 
   This has to be hacker Ive attached screenshot for your reference 
What all he is doing  
While Im on office call he will interrupt by sending automated SPAM calls and he will put the front person caller on hold
He will turn off my dongle which is connected to my office laptop
He will turn off my matrimony notification

crimeaditionalinfo: The complainant Fabindia has loyalty program system know as FAB family for its customers who are above  years of age and resident of India The program rewards the customer interaction with the brand including their expenditure made at stores or on website participation in surveys feedback and referrals The program works on GRAVITY platform which has been designed for Complainants loyalty program by its ecommerce IT partner Mastek On  Complainant was informed that the official email id has been hacked by the Accused and the Accused has gained illegal access to the computer system of the Complainant and have replaced the customer mobile number with an unknown mobile no  and have redeemed the loyalty points of the customers associated with the changed mobile number The said act has been done multiple times in between  to  using same mobile no  and have redeemed  loyalty points through  transactions The value of  point is INR  The number  of the Accused was blocked by the Complainant but a new account was created again using the same number by the Accused

Gaurang Mistry

Mumbai

Dear SirMam

I want to register an online CYBER FRAUD incident that happened via android application KOKO cash app downloaded on google play store

Yesterday on st March  In an unfortunate situation of urgent cash requirement I enquired on an Android Mobile Application named KOKO Loan reliable rupee Cash by Navacarry Tech Private Limited the enquiry process was similar to any genuine financial institution KYC requirement ie Upload and filling of PAN CARD and AADHAR CARD details along with OTP based contact details while enquiry I did allow it for certain permission such as viewing contact details

After completing this process they took my bank details for confirmation and credited it with Rupee  after that nothing has been credited to my account as per my best knowledge but immediately it started showing rupees  due in next  days while i have received nothing from them so far 

This whole incident was frightening and i started sensing fraud or some scam due to this feeling i again went to google play application for its review and feedback and it turned out more scary people reviewed and remarked it as their worst experience of harassment and exploitation

Review highlighted that app demands repayment of some amount which they never get credited some people have made payment but still they keep harassing them by claiming that they did not receive any payment if someone denies payment they access their contact details  harrass the friends

crimeaditionalinfo:
Dear Sir  Madam

This is to inform you that I am the Proprietor of VR Group with GST No AFYPREZW  Our primary business is of creating and managing apps youtube channels etc and I use the email id anrnanvngmailcom to manage all my accounts viz  Google Playstore Ads Analytics Razorpay Payment Gateway Bigrockin for Server and SSL certificate etc  

I noticed that all my emails got deleted before th of Jan  both from Inbox  Sent Items I thought it may be some glitch hence emails are not loading  However today th Feb  when I tried logging into my Google Ads account I found out that I cannot login as the password has been changed  I got super worried as our business is linked with this email id and I immediately tried recovering the password but the phone no it showed is not mine which clearly means that someone has hacked into my account and changed the password and recovery options  

I am a retired person  have spent more than Rs  lakh rupees on Google ads to get downloads for my app and also to promote my youtube channel  The google ads account also has my sons credit card saved in the same  the same can be misused  The Google playstore account is also linked to the same id  the hacker can delete my app also from the appstore  I humbly request you to kindly track and arrest the culprit at the earliest and help me recover my email id  save my business

Regards

Ram Jinis Raut

vrgroupindiagmailcom

I Rahul Sharma is a lawabiding citizen of this country
In order to undertake my routine official activities I am using the official Email ID of the Company ie rahulmicromaxinfocom I have never faced any problem in using this Email ID however yesterday ie on  at around  AM I received an Email from my own above mentioned Email ID ie rahulmicromaxinfocom in which the sender of that Email has threatened me to transfer USD  in the form of crypto currency to the accounts mentioned in the said mail failing which he will leak my personal information pictures and other material on  public platforms Copy of Email dated  is as AnnexureA   
It is crystal clear from the said Email that my official Email ID or Computer System has been hacked by some unknown persons with an ulterior motive to harass blackmail malign my reputation and extort huge amount of money from me in order to have illegal monetary gains
I am in utter shock and traumatized on receipt of  such threatening Email dated  and request you to kindly take proper and prompt action against these unknown persons as my personal data and reputation is at stake If no stern and immediate action is taken against these unknown persons then I will suffer irreparable damages which cannot be compensated later 
I would request you to kindly register an FIR against  unknown persons and  investigate into the aforesaid offences and take strict action against wrongdoer

Yesterday I received a message on linkdin from a unknown person stating he require my services I gave him my whatsapp number as it is comman practice and he sent me zip file saying it has all projects details 
I opened the zip file it had few images and one exe file with pdf logo I tried opening exe file it was nothing opened I was bit suspicious so checked it was extracting data in back end I immediately deleted all files and turned of my wifi and then scanned my laptop 
I closed my laptop thinking I just avoid a big cyber attack 

Later in night I opened my laptop again and checked my Facebook and gmail and saw all facebook account was hacked and even few Gmail ids were attempt to breach 
I changed password and tried recovering accounts and then reset my laptop
But I am not sure what all data has been lost and compromised

I was listening music in my house a person near my house instantly repeated the pros of the music that I was hearing at that instant in my phone and I just thought he might be having sharp hearing
Gradually with time they themselves began to talk the relevant scenarios to whom only I could be the witness and the actor of the act
However as soon as I move out of my house in order to caught the entire nuisance going in my neighbour Those people use to move out of the site or be quiet However I enquired a person whom I heard involved in the nuisance but he denied of whatever was going outside
I told about this to my parents but they just thought that I had just gone sceptical
Gradually I came to know the fact that my neighbours with whom my family has bad relations were also involved in the conversations However I was unaware of the fact that they have manipulated something in my computer hardwares by virtue of which they use to know the inner goings of my house
I then talked to the person who were majorly engaged in this activity but they did not said anything on this

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
Our login in GST eway bill Portal got compromised on  as the was unauthorizedly logged in by unknown person for generating several eway bill amounting to thousands of crores of rupees

I had received several informative messages from GST Department that  EWB No XYZ is having invoice value more than Rs crores 

On receipt of these messages I got suspicious as the EWB Nos stated in such messages were not generated by us Therefore I got my account checked and noticed that several EWB were generated from our account As the same were not generated by us I got cancelled all such EWBs that came to our notice

It is pertinent to mention that whoever has generated these EWBs used bogus invoice numbers and mentioned HSN code of items which are not supplied by us however the supplier recipients in these EWBs were our clients suppliers

Since the EWBs generated by unknown person by misusing our login credentials mention bogus invoices involving huge amounts such as EWB Amount   Rs  Rs  Rs  Rs  Rs  Rs  Rs we are frightened that such transactions may entail action from Several Govt Departments

Therefore we are reporting the aforesaid incidents to Cyber Crime Branch with a request for detailed investigation and finding out the culprit

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
On th Jan  my flipkart order got cancelled by itself i did not cancelled any order  I received a call from the no  at  pm which is flipkart customer care service and was informed that the order got cancelled due to backend issues  So please share the otp to get your order by evening  I rechecked on truecaller which clearly stated flipkart customer care Unfortunately i shared the otp and witin a second i received the message  
The phone number linked to your Flipkart account has been updated to 
I was so shocked to see that my account got hackedI immediately called the flipkart customer support to address the issue and it took few hours for them to get back to me
I filed a complaint at the cyber crime and reported idfc bank too for the fraud transaction and have called flipkart day and night for hours many times  And still nothing is sorted out no solution to this issue  Even on twitter i tried to contact but no solution has been provided till date 
I was informed by flipkart customer care that an apple phone  real me phones and few other products have been ordered using paylater and were delivered within  minutes I mean is this a joke This itself shows how irresponsible flipkart is
My account is still not recovered back to me and i am receiving payment reminders for these false transactions This is a pure case of unsafe privacy on flipkart and mental torture

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
Respected SirMadam
We BH Infonet Pvt Ltd are a ClassB VNO licensed ISP located in Thane The detailed sequence of the events is as under  
On Jan around  PM it came to our notice that our many clients were unable to log into clientportal hosted on GoDaddycom The techsupport agent of our serverapplication suspected problems with DNS
When logged into GoDaddy the domain host it came to our notice that there was a suspicious login on Jan at  IST Screencapture of the account activity is attached with this mail
We suspect that someone with malicious intent purposely deleted one of the DNSrecords from GoDaddy portal to cause financial loss as well as mental harassment to the company as well as our clients
Furthermore please note that recently few of our employees have left the job without prior notice And they have knowledge of login credentials of GoDaddy We suspect that one of the employees could be involved in this incidence
We at BH Infonet and our clients are traumatized by such actions and request you to kindly take proper and prompt action against these userspersons as our company reputation as well as financial future is in danger Also if no action is taken against these userspersons there would be irreparable damage that I would have to suffer on business front
We request you to promptly investigate into the aforesaid offences and take strict action against them in law
Thanking you in advance for your efforts

Reporting Unauthorized Access on behalf of my father Call received on my father phone  from  at pm rd Feb  it was disconnected Second call received from  at pm he picks up says hello call disconnected at pm message with OTP comes with  Your Whatsapp account is being registered on a new device   with code My father did not share this code Once informed I checked the Whatsapp application on the stated phone and found a new number listed and it is trying to verify  Verify your number  I took a screenshot as attached and exit from application On another phone which my father owns  same notification with  Your Whatsapp account is being registered on a new device   pops up I could not take  a screenshot Fearing unauthorized access  I factory reset both phones Please note both phones are of Jio Network Today again another message comes on  stating  Your Whatsapp account is being registered on a new device   It seems some one or thing is trying to access my fathers phone data however not sure what data has been breached My father is retired pensioner with account information in messages request your kind attention to resolve this issue and verify data breach

Thanks
Dipanjan Chakraborty
Son of Somnath Chakraborty

Respected Sir Madam
This started by Jan end th of year  when I first time I got whatsapp notification that my whatsapp is been logged into some other device I immediately logged it out then my calls where having interruption in connecting however I dint gave it much importance as I thought it would be due to network issue Later on there was another instance of whatsapp logged in again I did the same then I checked my google account and I saw there was  unknown number linked to my this account i immediately removed it and reset my google account details after which there was calling interruption consistent as in line were getting comnected anywhere and i was not getting my calls at one go neither I was able to make any call at once i had to dial  to  times to get connected at present I call to my wife my number is been displayed as  with  others which clarifies its been hacked Im afraid its been hacked from a long period of time and even my wifes number is been hacked the ring while I make calls sounds different then normally and my phone functions anytime amything without my knowledge Please look into this matter as i find this quiet serious and Im afraid Thanking you

My mobile and email is hacked by Shaha FinLease Pvt Ltd Office No  th Floor VIHAN Opp Nutan Chemical Compound Walbhat RoadGoregaon East Mumbai   I have taken credit card from Standard Chartered Bank with Rs credit limit in the year  due to my financial problems I couldnt repay at that moment later when I tried to contact the bank they told I have to pay more than Rs so I didnt pay as they were asking huge amount in CIBIL they have 
Mentioned Rs   I received  mail months back for settlement for Rs i replied them  with the attached copy of the credit card statement as its mentioned only Rs  so they offered me for Rs For the settlement and I agreed for the same they sent a offer and intimation letter as I have to make the payment within January   due to the lockdown and other situations I couldnt arrange I asked for some more time but they didnt agree and started harassing making calls to my wife and other people mentioning theyll take action in all ways  all my friendsrelatives and business contacts started calling me and told that bank people are calling them and telling that I have cheated the bank with huge amount and telling them that I should settle it as soon as possible they have hacked my email mobile phone and took all the contact details of everyone without my knowledge I have lost my reputation with everyone because of  Shaha FinLease

Cyber Crime Delhi Police

Dear Sir

My email id is mkmohtagmailcom Today in the Morning at  AM I realised that a large number of emails from my Inbox and other folders were being deleted By the time I could change the Password of my email Id Emails and other correspondences for almost last  months have been deleted It is apparent that my email Id was hacked by some unauthorised person In order to cause damage to me and to destroy evidences It is also possible that by hacking my email some unauthorised emails may have been dispatched I am one of the Directors and Promoters of Ms Blue Sapphire Healthcares Pvt Ltd Corporate Identification Number is CIN DLPTC its registered address is Mandakini Enclave Alaknanda Delhi DL  IN  which owns and runs a chain of hospitals in the name of Asian Hospitals

Mukesh Mohta
Director Ms Blue Sapphire Healthcare Pvt Ltd
Registered address is Mandakini Enclave Alaknanda Delhi DL  IN

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
Timeline of the incidences
 Gmail account was accessed from almost  th of Nov dec  using the Delhi airtel postpaid mobile number 
 The complainaint realised on th dec midnight when google prompt came  changes made how you signin in google email   To ensure security password was changed email and phone numbers for step  verification was changed as well Account Recovery phone was changed as well 
 After two days step verification was set off by hackers The recovery phone number  which is suspected to be tracked was removed but the hackers put it back 
The user again put new numbers of family in step verification and email addresses from family This was again removed on th Dec and two unknown new mobile numbers have been set up for recovering the account which the original user is not aware off 
A prompt has been set up for unknown  motorolla G mobile  to recover the account 
  Formal complain raised with Cyber crime HSR layout Bangalore screenshots of these incidences enclosed 
 The issue was reported to google through bangalore cyber crime and myself and apple care team 
 Apple support suggested reset of my iPhone  and macbook pro 
After reset the macbook safari browser clearly showed  copies of iphone being used 
 It is suspected that through airtel mobile internet the iphone was accessed and  apple id  was revealed 
after resetting the macbook pro iphone  using a new internet location okay

Isliye mujhe mere AdharCard aur mere PanCard ka galat upyog hone dar laga rahta isliye main bharat sarkar se anurodh karta hun ki in farzi loan apps ko jald se jald puri tarha band kare anytha bhavishya me ye mere sarkari kagazon ka galat upyog karte hai to iska jimmedar main nahi Hunga dhanyabad

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
My name is Shuchi Agarrwal Managing Partner of SS Intellectual Property Neeti Consultancy LLP We provide services to our clients As part of maintaining information of our files we use various digital services for hosting our database maintaining our records servers etc For the same we have taken subscriptions of various agencies including GoDaddy WD etc We have noticed that since last  months we are facing hacking events where attempts to erase our data are made The events are as follows
	December    The data from our database hosted on GoDaddy was deleted
	December    The data hosted on our server hosted on the cloud of WD was completely deleted
	January    There was a hacking attempt due to which no one from my team could login We had to request GoDaddy to restore our database
	January    The data hosted on our server hosted on the cloud of WD was completely deleted 
	January    We use Spectra as Internet service provider However from Jan  the MAC address of the router was itself getting updated to Tenda Please note that we use Dlink so this is not natural It took  days for spectra people to reinstate our Internet service
	February    The entire database was deleted and a request was made to GoDaddy to deactivate our subscription at  am today morning We had to get the database restored to get our office function

crimeaditionalinfo:
Respected Sir
I am Sameer Pattnayak a manager working at Ideal Arch Visuals  Spacebound Labs situated at HNo       th Floor Srinagar Colony Main Rd Hyderabad Telangana 
I am writing this letter to inform you about cybercrime that has occurred at our office by one of our ex employees The Culprit Mr Ajay Rajendra Shenoy aka Ajay Shenoy aka ASHENO aka Asheno Productions SO Rajendra Narayan Shenoy resident of A Om Manusmruti Ghodbandar Road Near Suraj Park Kavesar Thane West Thane Kasarvadavali Maharashtra Mob   AADHAR  was employed as a Post Production Artist at Ideal Arch Visuals between th Jan  to th Jan resigned
During the st week of his employment he did not meet our expectations and was conveyed about the same on st Jan  He resigned unexpectedly on the evening of th Jan  after citing connection issues
A relieving letter was not issued immediately and his dues were expected to be cleared by th Feb  But we later confirmed that his dues will be cleared by th Feb 
He took it as nonpayment and accessed one of our systems at formatted  SSDs with around  TBs of data We are trying to recover the data but month worth of work can not be recovered only with the data His accessing the system is evident with the attachments
I therefore request you to take necessary actions against Mr Shenoy and guide us in further steps

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
I am Sangeeta Verma I run a digital marketing agency

I have very painfully grown this agency over last  years and specially during tough covid times for last  years

I paid all my employees in time without deduction despite loss in business

One of our employees Rajinder Singh took the salary on th and didnt report for work on th

th morning he for without any reason deleted the google mail ID assigned to him by our agency in which he was being paid to do our work

 We also use TRELLO a team work management software where he was assigned a portion and where many people used to post things to complete the clients work in a collaborative way

 He moved all the data to some other place on Trello

This act of his left us in a lot of problem in front of the clients

we are still recovering from the daata deleted by Rajinder


We are totally Unware why rajinder did this so we and many of his colleagues tried to reach him

He blocked all the numbers Somehow he responded to one of his colleagues to whom he said he has left the job and he should not be contacted anymore

He remained quiet when asked to give data he had moved

This data was created by him while he was working with us and he has no right to delete or move data elsewhere

We request you to book him for breach of this and ensure maximum punishment for him as he has taken law in his hands and has not responded to requested made to him to give the data back that does not belong to him

crimeaditionalinfo:
We have rented our office at BSEL Tech Park Vashi to Spectrum Techno Consultants Pvt Ltd and Test Yantra Software Solutions Pvt Ltd Both of them received fraudulent emails from our email id wherein the hacker sent them revised invoices with fraudulent bank details of an account in Indian Bank Latehar Jharkhand and the above parties thinking that the emails received are from us actually transferred the monies to this account instead of our actual account with Axis Bank

We got to know of this fraud only on th February  when we checked with both parties as to why they had not yet transferred the money to our account 

Both parties have since filed complaints with their respective banks

Request you to check the attached fraudulent invoice which has the bank details of the fraudulent account in Indian Bank Latehar Jharkhand and help retrieve the money

Yesterday I entered a quiz competition and I won the person who held the competition asked for my PayPal or Cash App to send the prize money I never recieved it so she said it will probably be some complications with the app and she will help me get the prize money then she told me change some settings in my account right after that she took hold of my account and changed all the personal details in it Then she posted some things on my account sent pictures to my followers and promoted something about Bitcoin and tagged an entrepreneur whom I think is a fraud When my friends texted my account she blocked all of them then they reported the picture she posted and it was removed from Instagram 
Now that I think of it the account of the person who held the competition must also be hacked because she was an American from Texas but when I got a notification from Instagram it said that the login was from Nigeria I checked the new details the hacker put into my accounti cant access much because I cannot login anymorebut the number that was used in my account seems to be from Nigeria
So im thinking this is more than just a random hack perhaps it was some network of people running a some pyramid scheme on Instagram to get people to pay for false Bitcoin or crypto currency
The account that was tagged from the picture they posted was a black woman entrepreneurso shes probably behind it all 
Please help me

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
I am Harshit Disodia resident of A POCKET C MAYUR VIHAR PHASE  NEW DELHI I was using internet through private broadband connection since long time But two days back due to some issues with it i was unable to use it Also I am postgraduate student pursuing my Masters program from University of Delhi I had attend the online class anyhow So i decided to connect to the public network which was provided by Delhi govt Under the scheme DELHI SARKAR FREE WIFI 

I am tech savy person from the childhood and i know how to protect my device from any unwanted attacks Before using this public network I have never experienced any cyber attack or any phishing attempt

Tommorow just after connecting to the public network mentioned above I received the notification on my email that my twitter account has been accessed in Patna by someone at pm Just after receiving the notification within seconds i changed my password and checked whether anything was done through my account and fortunately nothing has happened

TodayAM again I got alerted for login which was not done by me again This time it was my Instagram account The sucessfull attempt was made from some  railway station in Hyderabad

This has never happened with me in the past I suspect the main role of the public wifi which spread across whole territory of Delhi I have opted for login activity emails and i checked my regularly that is why i got to know it Kindly investigate the incident

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
I Dharmendra Kumar am a teacher by profession and offer tuition in Delhi On the th of February while I was browsing mobile applications on Playstore and I downloaded a mobile application named KoKo Loan App Pursuant to this I was offered to check eligibility for an instant loan The moment I entered my details in the app for checking eligibility an amount of Rs  was credited to my account Thereafter within minutes I deposited back the same amount which was credited in my Account Number  having its branch at New Delhi 

From the very next day I started receiving calls from various numbers asking me to deposit a sum of Rs  I was also being threatened that they have access to all the data of my Mobile and they will ruin my image if they do not receive the amount Since I had not taken any loan from them and the amount credited in my account was returned to the account from which it came within minutes I did not pay the amount which was being demanded by them 

Thereafter various messages along with my photograph alleging that I am loan chor and rapist are being sent to most of my contacts As a consequence of this I have undergone Mental Harassment and my public image is also being tarnished 

It is humbly requested that the Law Enforcement Agencies take adequate legal action against them so that they are not able to malign my image any further

Sir

I AM employed as a Development Officer in LIC of India Central Govt Undertaking  Every morning I would be sending SMS to my Subordinates about the day activities  This morning too by  am I had sent GROUP SMS to my  Juniors  By  am I got an SMS from a Number  attachment uploaded stating that You reached  PERCENT of your daily SMS limit Next second I got nd SMS from the same number stating that  You reached  PERCENT of your daily SMS limit YOu can be blocked till midnight  

Generally only the Service Provider would send such Alert from their Board Number On suspicion I contacted the Service Provider JIO and sought clarification  They replied that they dont send any such message from Private Number  When I checked that Number  in TRUE CALLER it is showing as FRAUD  

I am worried whether my Phone is being attempted to be HACKED I am in a responsibile position in my Institution managing important data  Hence I thought of reporting it to CYBER CRIME Cell of the Govt of India

Request your kind intervention and necessary action

Thanks a lot in advance

P SRIDHAR

category: Hacking  Damage to computercomputer system etc
crimeaditionalinfo:
I had taken a loan from the mobile app Eklavya Rupee Credit Wallet Credit Rupee and Agile Loan which is offered in Google Play Store
Due to COVID  situation I am unable to repay my dues on time
They are charging exorbitant fees in the name of  service fees 
Collection agents call from different numbers as well as send filthy messages and voice recordings constantly in my WhatsApp threatening me that if I do not pay the loan by the due date or one date before the due date they will start calling people who are in my contact list as they have total access to my contact list while the app was downloaded from the Google Play Store
They have even sent filthy and lewd WhatsApp messages to my other contacts masking my Aadhar Card causing tremendous mental agony to them as well as to me
They have complete access to my contact list and gallery and they are randomly calling and sending messages to the people in my contact list causing tremendous mental harassment and agony They are even threatening to block my Adhaar card Pan Card and bank account
I stay with my old mother who is  years old and is a cardiac patient and she cannot bear this trauma at all
I had filed a police complaint with GDE No  dated  with my current residential local PSDomjur PSwhich is under Howrah Police Commissionerate to stop this mental harassment and cyber bullying and terrorism

Dear SirMadam
With due respect I want to state that on th of January a message came on my inbox which stated that it is eligible for me to take  as loan and along with there came a link and on clicking that it shows to download an app named Money Instant
I downloaded that and after it had asked me to upload the adhar card and pan card details  Uploading that  it also asked for the bank account details
Within a span of  minutes  credited to my account 
Seeing that i reopened the app and it states to repay the loan within  days and the amount also is 
I tried my utmost to contact to the customer care of the app but I couldnt
After the Span of  days they started calling me and asked to repay  but I have asked them too to please take the  back  In fact I tell them too that if needed I will add more  but to shut down the loan but they denied 
The worst part is that they have used such oppressive slang words which shouldnt me used as per me And they have hacked my contact list  gallery and everything personal  They are continuously blackmailing me my parents and my close ones too 
Still I tried my best to make them understand to please take their money back but they are not agreeing  
They warned me that as because I have already uploaded the adhaar and pan card details they will make ubrupt use of it
If such thing happens I will not be responsible for it

Therefore I want to request you to please take a step and help me and every possible way
